description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to strengthen conflict resolution and reconciliation at community and county levels in Liberia. Through the implementation of community-based, bottom-up approaches in which project participants increase their self-awareness, learn more positive behaviours and are able to meaningfully connect to each other, this project contributes to strengthening peaceful conflict resolution and reconciliation at local levels. The specific objective of this project is to strengthen social cohesion and civic trust within and between communities and between population and local government in five counties in Liberia. Community-based methodologies are implemented for strengthening peace, social cohesion and civic engagement as well as civic trust and enhancing good governance principles, including transparency, accountability, participation and inclusion.

Svenska ambassaden har fått en förfrågan av ZOA och YMCA att finansiera projektet "Peacebuilding and Reconciliation through Community Dialogues II" i Liberia med 11 600 000 kronor under perioden 2021-2022.
Huvudsyftet med stödet är stärka konfliktlösning och försoning på lokal nivå, samt att förbättra individers psykosociala välmående och familjedynamik och att stärka jämställdhet på familjenivå. Insatsen omfattar dessa områden:
* Förbättrad mental hälsa och psykosocialt välmående
* Förbättrad social sammanhållning och medborgerligt förtroende
* God sammhällsstyrning/good governance
* Stärkt medborgardeltagande
* Ökad tillgång till information

ZOA and YMCA have applied to the Swedish Embassy for funding of 11 600 000 SEK to carry out the project "Peacebuilding and Reconciliation through Community Dialogues II" in Liberia during the period 2021-2022.
The intervention aims at strengthening conflict resolution and reconciliation initiatives at community and county level, while improving individual well-being and family dynamics, including more gender equal relations at the household level. The project is centered around these areas:
* Improved mental health and psychosocial well-being * Improved co-existence and civic trust * Good governance * Increased levels of civic engagement * Increased access to information
*Outcome 1: Improved psychosocial well-being and enhanced interpersonal relations within families and the community
*Outcome 2: Local leaders and government officials adhere to and act upon good governance principles
*Outcome 3: Improved civic participation and positive engagement with local government
*Outcome 4: A peaceful and safe school environment is established for students to reach their full potential
Outcome 5: Increased capacity of YMCA to independently implement similar projects

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: 16.10 - 0 Säkerställa allmän tillgång till information och skydda grundläggande friheter, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning och internationella avtal.
16.10 - Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
